verses.verse: And Saul <S%H7586><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> to Jonathan <S%H3129><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, and to all his servants <S%H5650><s%>, that they should kill <S%H4191><s%> David <S%H1732><s%>.

But Jonathan <S%H3083><s%> Saul's <S%H7586><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> delighted <S%H2654><s%> much <S%H3966><s%> in David <S%H1732><s%>: and Jonathan <S%H3083><s%> told <S%H5046><s%> David <S%H1732><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Saul <S%H7586><s%> my father <S%H1><s%> seeketh <S%H1245><s%> to kill <S%H4191><s%> thee: now therefore, I pray thee, take heed <S%H8104><s%> to thyself until the morning <S%H1242><s%>, and abide <S%H3427><s%> in a secret <S%H5643><s%> place, and hide <S%H2244><s%> thyself:

And I will go out <S%H3318><s%> and stand <S%H5975><s%> beside <S%H3027><s%> my father <S%H1><s%> in the field <S%H7704><s%> where thou art, and I will commune <S%H1696><s%> with my father <S%H1><s%> of thee; and what <S%H4100><s%> I see <S%H7200><s%>, that I will tell <S%H5046><s%> thee.

And Jonathan <S%H3083><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%> unto Saul <S%H7586><s%> his father <S%H1><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> unto him, Let not the king <S%H4428><s%> sin <S%H2398><s%> against his servant <S%H5650><s%>, against David <S%H1732><s%>; because he hath not sinned <S%H2398><s%> against thee, and because his works <S%H4639><s%> have been to thee-ward very <S%H3966><s%> good <S%H2896><s%>:

For he did put <S%H7760><s%> his life <S%H5315><s%> in his hand <S%H3709><s%>, and slew <S%H5221><s%> the Philistine <S%H6430><s%>, and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> wrought <S%H6213><s%> a great <S%H1419><s%> salvation <S%H8668><s%> for all Israel <S%H3478><s%>: thou sawest <S%H7200><s%> it, and didst rejoice <S%H8055><s%>: wherefore then wilt thou sin <S%H2398><s%> against innocent <S%H5355><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%>, to slay <S%H4191><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> without a cause <S%H2600><s%>?

And Saul <S%H7586><s%> hearkened <S%H8085><s%> unto the voice <S%H6963><s%> of Jonathan <S%H3083><s%>: and Saul <S%H7586><s%> sware <S%H7650><s%>, As the LORD <S%H3068><s%> liveth <S%H2416><s%>, he shall not <S%H518><s%> be slain <S%H4191><s%>.

And Jonathan <S%H3083><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> David <S%H1732><s%>, and Jonathan <S%H3083><s%> shewed <S%H5046><s%> him all those things <S%H1697><s%>. And Jonathan <S%H3083><s%> brought <S%H935><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> to Saul <S%H7586><s%>, and he was in his presence <S%H6440><s%>, as in times past <S%H865><s%> <S%H8032><s%>. in times: Heb. yesterday, third day

And there was war <S%H4421><s%> again <S%H3254><s%>: and David <S%H1732><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%>, and fought <S%H3898><s%> with the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>, and slew <S%H5221><s%> them with a great <S%H1419><s%> slaughter <S%H4347><s%>; and they fled <S%H5127><s%> from <S%H6440><s%> him. him: Heb. his face

And the evil <S%H7451><s%> spirit <S%H7307><s%> from the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was upon Saul <S%H7586><s%>, as he sat <S%H3427><s%> in his house <S%H1004><s%> with his javelin <S%H2595><s%> in his hand <S%H3027><s%>: and David <S%H1732><s%> played <S%H5059><s%> with his hand <S%H3027><s%>.

And Saul <S%H7586><s%> sought <S%H1245><s%> to smite <S%H5221><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> even to the wall <S%H7023><s%> with the javelin <S%H2595><s%>; but he slipped away <S%H6362><s%> out of Saul's <S%H7586><s%> presence <S%H6440><s%>, and he smote <S%H5221><s%> the javelin <S%H2595><s%> into the wall <S%H7023><s%>: and David <S%H1732><s%> fled <S%H5127><s%>, and escaped <S%H4422><s%> that night <S%H3915><s%>.

Saul <S%H7586><s%> also sent <S%H7971><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%> unto David's <S%H1732><s%> house <S%H1004><s%>, to watch <S%H8104><s%> him, and to slay <S%H4191><s%> him in the morning <S%H1242><s%>: and Michal <S%H4324><s%> David's <S%H1732><s%> wife <S%H802><s%> told <S%H5046><s%> him, saying <S%H559><s%>, If thou save <S%H4422><s%> not thy life <S%H5315><s%> to night <S%H3915><s%>, to morrow <S%H4279><s%> thou shalt be slain <S%H4191><s%>.
So Michal <S%H4324><s%> let <S%H3381><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> through a window <S%H2474><s%>: and he went <S%H3212><s%>, and fled <S%H1272><s%>, and escaped <S%H4422><s%>.

And Michal <S%H4324><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> an image <S%H8655><s%>, and laid <S%H7760><s%> it in the bed <S%H4296><s%>, and put <S%H7760><s%> a pillow <S%H3523><s%> of goats' <S%H5795><s%> hair for his bolster <S%H4763><s%>, and covered <S%H3680><s%> it with a cloth <S%H899><s%>. image: Heb. teraphim
And when Saul <S%H7586><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%> to take <S%H3947><s%> David <S%H1732><s%>, she said <S%H559><s%>, He is sick <S%H2470><s%>.

And Saul <S%H7586><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> the messengers <S%H4397><s%> again to see <S%H7200><s%> David <S%H1732><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Bring him up <S%H5927><s%> to me in the bed <S%H4296><s%>, that I may slay <S%H4191><s%> him.

And when the messengers <S%H4397><s%> were come in <S%H935><s%>, behold, there was an image <S%H8655><s%> in the bed <S%H4296><s%>, with a pillow <S%H3523><s%> of goats' <S%H5795><s%> hair for his bolster <S%H4763><s%>.

And Saul <S%H7586><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Michal <S%H4324><s%>, Why hast thou deceived me so <S%H7411><s%>, and sent away <S%H7971><s%> mine enemy <S%H341><s%>, that he is escaped <S%H4422><s%>? And Michal <S%H4324><s%> answered <S%H559><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%>, He said <S%H559><s%> unto me, Let me go <S%H7971><s%>; why should I kill <S%H4191><s%> thee?

So David <S%H1732><s%> fled <S%H1272><s%>, and escaped <S%H4422><s%>, and came <S%H935><s%> to Samuel <S%H8050><s%> to Ramah <S%H7414><s%>, and told <S%H5046><s%> him all that Saul <S%H7586><s%> had done <S%H6213><s%> to him. And he and Samuel <S%H8050><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> and dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in Naioth <S%H5121><s%>.
And it was told <S%H5046><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Behold, David <S%H1732><s%> is at Naioth <S%H5121><s%> in Ramah <S%H7414><s%>.

And Saul <S%H7586><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%> to take <S%H3947><s%> David <S%H1732><s%>: and when they saw <S%H7200><s%> the company <S%H3862><s%> of the prophets <S%H5030><s%> prophesying <S%H5012><s%>, and Samuel <S%H8050><s%> standing <S%H5975><s%> as appointed <S%H5324><s%> over them, the Spirit <S%H7307><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> was upon the messengers <S%H4397><s%> of Saul <S%H7586><s%>, and they also prophesied <S%H5012><s%>.

And when it was told <S%H5046><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%>, he sent <S%H7971><s%> other <S%H312><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%>, and they prophesied <S%H5012><s%> likewise. And Saul <S%H7586><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%> again <S%H3254><s%> the third <S%H7992><s%> time, and they prophesied <S%H5012><s%> also.

Then went <S%H3212><s%> he also to Ramah <S%H7414><s%>, and came <S%H935><s%> to a great <S%H1419><s%> well <S%H953><s%> that is in Sechu <S%H7906><s%>: and he asked <S%H7592><s%> and said <S%H559><s%>, Where <S%H375><s%> are Samuel <S%H8050><s%> and David <S%H1732><s%>? And one said <S%H559><s%>, Behold, they be at Naioth <S%H5121><s%> in Ramah <S%H7414><s%>.

And he went <S%H3212><s%> thither to Naioth <S%H5121><s%> in Ramah <S%H7414><s%>: and the Spirit <S%H7307><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> was upon him also, and he went <S%H3212><s%> on <S%H1980><s%>, and prophesied <S%H5012><s%>, until he came <S%H935><s%> to Naioth <S%H5121><s%> in Ramah <S%H7414><s%>.

And he stripped off <S%H6584><s%> his clothes <S%H899><s%> also <S%H1571><s%>, and prophesied <S%H5012><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Samuel <S%H8050><s%> in like manner, and lay down <S%H5307><s%> naked <S%H6174><s%> all that day <S%H3117><s%> and all that night <S%H3915><s%>. Wherefore they say <S%H559><s%>, Is Saul <S%H7586><s%> also among the prophets <S%H5030><s%>? lay: Heb. fell
